display.name: Video GPT by VEED
display.description: AI Video Maker. Generate videos for social media - YouTube, Instagram, TikTok and more! Free text to video & speech tool with AI Avatars, TTS, music, and stock footage.
prompt_starters: Let's create a video!
AI text to speech
Create AI Avatar video
Write a video script

info.title: VEED Text to Video API
info.description: The VEED Text to Video API API is used to create VEED projects using AI-generated scripts, titles, text-to-speech, background music and stock footage.

post.description: Using a prompt OR script AND voice OR avatar, generate a VEED video project

prompt.description: Prompt that is used to generate a video script if `script` is not provided

script.description: The video script of the generated video if `prompt` is not provided

voice.description: Type of voice used for the voiceover if `avatar` is not provided

avatar.description: The avatar used in the generated video if `voice` is not provided

200.description: Expected response to a valid request

link.description: URL to edit the project in the VEED editor

display.name: Resume
display.description: By combining the expertise of top resume writers with advanced AI, we assist in diagnosing and enhancing your resume | ATS Compatible | Tailor Your Resume for a Specific Job | We value your experience, please contact support@jobright.ai if you need support❤️!
prompt_starters: Can you help me analyze my resume?
Can you help me tailor my resume with this job?
Find jobs that fit with my background?
How to make my resume ATS compatible?

info.title: Job Search and Query Parsing API
info.description: APIs for parsing search queries and searching jobs

daysAgo.description: default to 3, represents jobs within 3 day (72 hours)

oneLineInput.description: One sentence input from user to describe the job search preference

visitId.description: An ID to identify user's identity, can hardcode to '4096' for now

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

result.description: Filter conditions returned by the server

post.description: Search for jobs based on various filters

startPos.description: The starting position for the search results. This parameter could be for simple pagination, for example, if user has seen 20 jobs, you can set startPos to 20 for next batch of jobs.

sortCondition.description: The condition used for sorting the search results. RELEVANCE is the default value which means sort by relevance, FRESHNESS is sorting by fresheness so that fresh jobs will go first.

requirements.description: List of requirements or qualifications of the job

h1BStatus.description: Either Past Sponsorship or Explicit mentioned

display.name: Video Maker
display.description: 4.2 ★ - Make engaging videos with voiceovers with this Video GPT!
prompt_starters: Let's create a youtube shorts video!
Let's create a marketing video.
Let's create an explainer video.
Let's start by creating a script...

info.title: invideo AI
info.description: Plugin for crafting narrated videos from text prompts and scripts.

post.summary: Generate video from a detailed brief.

brief.description: Plain english text starting with "Create a video" or "Create a [platform] video"

settings.description: Plain english text covering instructions such as gender and accent of the voiceover, tone of the background music. Can be left empty.

platforms.description: suggest three platforms this video would be ideal for

audiences.description: suggest three audiences this video would be ideal for

length_in_minutes.description: suggest the length of the video in minutes

openaiFileIdRefs.description: list of images to include in the video. These should be created by DALL·E or uploaded by the user. JPG, WEBP, and PNG are supported

script.description: plain english text that is the script of the video

settings.description: Plain english text covering instructions such as gender and accent of the voiceover, tone of the background music. Can be left empty.

platforms.description: suggest three platforms this video would be ideal for

audiences.description: suggest three audiences this video would be ideal for

length_in_minutes.description: suggest the length of the video in minutes

openaiFileIdRefs.description: list of images to include in the video. These should be created by DALL·E or uploaded by the user. JPG, WEBP, and PNG are supported

display.name: Slide Maker
display.description: Prompt to create PowerPoint presentations. Can read links to web pages, Google Drive, OneDrive, and more to fetch content.
prompt_starters: Legal presentation on current AI regulations in EU.
Board presentation for AI digital marketing strategy.
Sales presentation for NVIDIA H100 GPU chips.
Investment presentation on NVIDIA from 2010-2020.

language.description: The two-digit ISO 639-1 code representing the expected human language for the document content.
language.title: Language

openaiFileIdRefs.description: List of files to use during document generation, such as images or PDF / DOCX / PPTX files for downstream GPT to use for writing document. Each object contains: `name` - name of the file; `id` - identifier for the file; `mime_type` - mime type of the file; `download_link` - the URL to fetch the file.
openaiFileIdRefs.title: Openaifileidrefs

pageCount.description: The number of document pages (or number of presentation slides) to generate.
pageCount.title: Pagecount

prompt.description: Instructions that will be used by a GPT-3.5 model to create the document. The instructions should be detailed and contain important information.
prompt.title: Prompt

f1_http_url.description: User will pass a HTTPS or HTTP url to a file so that the file contents can be read.
f1_http_url.title: F1 Http Url

f2_query.description: User will pass a query string to fetch relevant sections from the contents. It will be used for sentence-level similarity search on the document based on embeddings.
f2_query.title: F2 Query

f3_selected_pages.description: Filter document on these page numbers. Use empty list to get all pages.
f3_selected_pages.title: F3 Selected Pages

info.description: A GPT that allows the user to create a presentation.
info.title: Slide Maker GPT

post.description: Create a presentation indirectly by prompting a GPT model specialized for generating long presentations
post.summary: Create a presentation indirectly by prompting a GPT model specialized for generating long presentations

post.description: Allows for reading the contents of an URL link, including PDF/DOC/DOCX/PPT/CSV/XLS/XLSX/HTML content, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, aidocmaker.com docs. Always wrap image URLs from the response field `z1_image_urls` in Markdown, where each image has a ## DESCRIPTION.
post.summary: Read the contents of an URL link

display.name: Adobe Express
display.description: Stand out with Adobe Express. Quickly and easily make impactful social posts, images, videos, flyers, and more. Your use of Adobe Express GPT is acceptance of our terms of use (https://adobe.ly/legal) and privacy policy (https://adobe.ly/privacy)
prompt_starters: Design a logo for my donut shop
I need a flyer for my sports podcast
Create an Instagram reel of my beach vacation
Make a Facebook post about my bake sale

info.title: Adobe Express Create and Edit Design GPT
info.description: This GPT enables users to search and retrieve design templates from Adobe Express, specifically tailored to their needs, such as logos for coffee shops. Users can specify their search query, template type, and other parameters to find the most suitable designs.

servers.description: Server url to access Adobe Express GPT's action's API is hosted

post.summary: Retrieve design templates from Adobe Express
post.description: This endpoint allows users to search for specific types of design templates in Adobe Express. Users can specify a search query, template type, and additional behaviors to find templates that best suit their requirements.

requestBody.description: Request body to search for templates

200.description: A list of design templates matching the search criteria

searchQuery.description: The search query for finding relevant templates. The string includes the context of user query such as the topic of the design, color provided by user for fetching relevant templates. This is a required field for finding relevant templates.

templateType.description: The type of template to search for.

limit.description: Specifies the count of templates to return. This information may come in user's query.

templateRespMessage.description: Heading of the response to inform the user about the templates returned in response.
Heading of the response to inform the user about the templates returned in response.

editorUrl.description: URL to edit the template in Adobe Express with preloaded template.

Rendition.description: Specifies the clickable rendition image of template/design

srcHrefUrl.description: href url for rendition image to edit the template in Adobe Express with preloaded template.

display.name: Whimsical Diagrams
display.description: Explains and visualizes concepts with flowcharts, mindmaps and sequence diagrams.
prompt_starters: Show escalation process flowchart.
Sequence diagram for OAuth 2.0 flow.
Generate sitemap for a food delivery company.
Visualize ChatGPT architecture.

info.title: Diagram to Image API
info.description: A simple API to generate flowchart, mindmap, or sequence diagram images.

post.description: Accepts a string describing a flowchart and returns a URL to a rendered image

post.summary: Render markdown bullet list as a mindmap
post.description: Accepts a markdown bullet list and returns a URL to a rendered image
Accepts a string describing a sequence diagram and returns a URL to a rendered image

mermaid.description: Flowchart to be rendered, in Mermaid syntax

fileURL.description: URL of the file in Whimsical

markdown.description: Indented, markdown bullet list of mindmap nodes

fileURL.description: URL of the file in Whimsical
URL of the file in Whimsical

display.name: Browser Pro
display.description: Top browser expert! Provide 3X accurate responses. Read any links: PDFs, videos, etc. Create 10+ types of files, like mind maps & spreadsheets, from search-derived contents.
prompt_starters: Search for latest AI research outcomes.
Read this link and summarize the key points.
Generate a mind map on ChatGPT prompt skills.
Type LS to show all Browser Menu.

info.title: Sider Tools API
info.description: An API for various tools that are available from Sider AI to be used with any GPT.

get.description:
Extracts information from a single URL or a list of URLs.
:param url: A single URL or a string formatted as a JSON list of URLs.

:param query: Search query.
:param language: language code.
:param year_start: Start year.
:param year_end: End year.
:param sorted: false for relevance, true for date.

:param query: Search query.
:param language: language code.
:param country
:param sort: "new", "old", None.
:param before: type:YYYYMMDD
:param after: type:YYYYMMDD
:param status: "GRANT", "APPLICATION"

:param query: The search query.
:param language: language code.
:param time: Time period. Options are "h" for past hour, "d" for past day, "w" for past week, and "m" for past month.
:param country: country.
:param count: The number of search results to return.

:param query: The search query.
:param language: language code.
:param time: Time period. Options are "h" for past hour, "d" for past day, "w" for past week, and "m" for past month.
:param country: country.
:param count: The number of search results to return.

:param language: language code.
:param time: Time period. Options are "h" for past hour, "d" for past day, "w" for past week, and "m" for past month.

:param language
:param time: The time period to search for articles. Options are "h" for past hour, "d" for past day, "w" for past week, and "m" for past month.
:param country: The country to search for articles.

:param language: The language code of the articles to search for.

:param location: The location to search for articles.

:param query: The search query.
:param language: The language code of the articles to search for.
:param time: The time period to search for articles. Options are "w" for past week, "h" for past hour, "d" for past day, and "m" for past month.
:param country: The country to search for articles.

post.description:
:param type: Allowed types: [reveal]
:param slides: The slides content.
:param theme: Select Theme from: [beigo,blood,dracula,moon,night,serif,simple,sky,white]
:param transition: Select Transition from: [none, fade, slide, convex, concave, zoom]

:param type: Allowed types: [mermaid]
:param code: The code for the graph.

:param type: Allowed types: [pdf]
:param markdown: The markdown content to be converted to PDF.
:param url: The URL of the page to be converted to PDF.

:param type: Allowed types: [docx]
:param markdown: The markdown content to be converted to DOCX.
:param html: The HTML content to be converted to DOCX.

:param type: Allowed types: [xlsx]
:param csv: The CSV content to be converted to XLSX.

:param type: Allowed types: [default]
:param longitude: The longitude of the location.
:param latitude: The latitude of the location.
:param zoom: The zoom level of the map.

:param url: The URL of the page to be screenshotted.
:param width: The width of the screenshot.
:param height: The height of the screenshot.

:param text: The text to be converted to speech.
:param voice: voice selected from the list of available voices.

display.name: Link Reader
display.description: Read any links: webpage, youtube, PDF, PPT, image, Word doc etc; OCR image; Search & browse web.
prompt_starters: Discover the latest developments from OpenAI! (Search for news using the keyword "OpenAI.")
What recent investment news deserves attention?
Find PDF documents about "artificial intelligence" and "teaching"
Search for some cute pet pictures.

info.title: Link Reader
info.description: A plugin capable of searching and reading link content, featuring a search interface similar to Google. It can access and return content from links, supporting platforms like YouTube, PDF, PPT, Google Drive, and more.

get.summary: Get the content of any url, including web page URL,  PDF,  PPT, image, word, pages, numbers, excel and any other document URLs, google drive, google docs, google spreadsheet, youtube links, etc.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The url to get the content from

get.summary: Search Google and fetch JSON data

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The query you want to search.

parameters.name: gl
parameters.description: The country to use for the Google search (e.g., us for the United States, uk for United Kingdom, or fr for France).

parameters.name: hl
parameters.description: The language to use for the Google search. It's a two-letter language code. (e.g., en for English, es for Spanish, or fr for French).

parameters.name: tbm
parameters.description: The "tbm" parameter enables you to define your preferred search type, including regular Google Search (no tbm parameter), image search ("isch"), or news search ("nws").

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The result offset. It skips the given number of results. It's used for pagination.

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. (e.g., 10 (minimum) returns 10 results).

statusCode.description: The status code of the request

statusText.description: The status text of the request

content-type.description: The content type of the request

content-length.description: The content length of the request

last-modified.description: The last modified date of the request

og:image.description: The main image of the url

title.description: The title of the answer box

link.description: The link of the answer box

snippet.description: The snippet of the answer box

items.description: The image links of the answer box

title.description: The title of the knowledge graph

type.description: The type of entity in the knowledge graph

kgmid.description: The unique identifier of the entity in the knowledge graph

description.description: The description of the entity in the knowledge graph

items.description: The image links of the knowledge graph entity

title.description: The title of the organic result

link.description: The link to the organic result

snippet.description: The snippet of the organic result

source.description: The source of the organic result

items.description: The image links of the organic result

title.description: The title of the video result

link.description: The link to the video result

snippet.description: The snippet of the video result

thumbnail.description: The link to the thumbnail of the video result

source.description: The source of the video result

title.description: The title of the news result

link.description: The link to the news result

date.description: The publication date of the news result

snippet.description: The snippet of the news result

category.description: The category of the news result

thumbnail.description: The link to the thumbnail of the news result

source.description: The source of the news result

title.description: The title of the image result

original.description: The original source url of the image

link.description: The link to the result page

next.description: The query parameters for the next page

display.name: 超级PPT生成（Super PPT）
display.description: 先PPT大纲，再生成详细文案，最后丰富演讲稿，绘制素材（First create a PowerPoint outline, then generate detailed copywriting, and finally enrich the speech script, and create accompanying visual materials.）
prompt_starters: 请帮我写一个关于"chatgpt"的PPT
我想要写一个年度总结的PPT
Please help me write a PowerPoint presentation about 'ChatGPT'

display.name: Prompt Perfect
display.description: Automatically rewrite your prompts for precision, accuracy, and clarity
prompt_starters: How does this work?
Explain taxes. I'm a novice.
Search for the latest announcements in AI
Make an image of a historical figure if they were Gen Z

info.title: Prompt Perfect
info.description: A plugin that rephrases prompts deemed unclear, overly brief, or missing necessary information into clearer, more specific, and contextual prompts.

example.text: Compose a highly detailed and engaging tweet. Keep the tweet within the 280-character limit

text.description: The prompt text to be rephrased.
